regen.absent_element: designation of Normal Startup Mode when the TCS Software was halted normally
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode upon application of power when the TCS software was halted normally.

regen.absent_element: designating Normal Startup Mode when the TCS Software was halted normally
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode upon application of power if the TCS software was previously halted in a planned and normal manner.

regen.absent_element: designation of Normal Startup Mode upon planned termination
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode when the TCS software was halted due to a planned termination.

label: When the TCS Software is terminated normally the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode of operation upon application of power.
absence: situation of the TCS Software is terminated normally
